Text:
un-fucking-believable! geoff johns is a sick sonofabitch.

can't wait for the internet to go apeshit crazy about this one!

OMFG!  Read this before going to work and I cannot beleive they really did that to such an established well known and loved character!!!!  How the hell can they bring her back?  Whoa is all I can say......just Whoa
I'm truly surprised batman hasn't killed himself yet with this hell that is his life...all the f'n time!
I expect Batman to truly let go this time, Unlike what happened when the Joker killed Jason Todd....
